channel.title: StreetSmart Chinese on StreetSmart Chinese 永远学习中文
channel.description: Recent content in StreetSmart Chinese on StreetSmart Chinese 永远学习中文

item.description: Welcome to StreetSmart Chinese Chinese Language Consultancy & Interpretation Name & Details Wilfred Githuka 楚大洋 Hey there, thank you for landing on my site. Am a Chinese Language Technical Interpretor and Trainer and here I write about my experience while at it. 大家好，我叫楚大洋，欢迎大家来到我的技术博客。 热爱自动驾驶，目前钻研机器学习和数据挖掘。我基本用python写代码，当然也会在Ros下用c++写一些东西。 Current Assignment Agricultural Value Addition Technology Training - Konoin Technical Training Institute Web Old Website(Wordpress) SoundCloud Email: wilfred.gachugi [at] gmail.com Mobile & Social Wechat/微信号：The-Wilfred Weibo Microblog/新浪微博：weibo.
